summary: This is an email from an unnamed individual to a victim/witness coordinator at the SDNY, describing their past involvement with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein in the mid-1990s. The writer seeks resources and information regarding Maxwell's upcoming trial, expressing feelings of invalidation due to their age at the time and the statute of limitations.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The writer states they met Maxwell, who was a client, and that Maxwell introduced them to Jeffrey Epstein. The writer was 'involved' with them for a few years in the mid-1990s.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The writer was introduced to Epstein by Ghislaine Maxwell and was 'involved' with them for a few years in the mid-1990s, describing unspeakable things that happened.

connections.description: The writer was introduced to Epstein by Maxwell and was 'involved' with both of them, suggesting a collaborative association in the context of the alleged abuse.
The writer describes Maxwell as a client who introduced them to Epstein and with whom they were 'involved,' resulting in unspeakable events that altered their life.
The writer was introduced to Epstein by Maxwell and was 'involved' with him, describing unspeakable things that happened which altered their life.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest
events.description: The writer mentions it became news that Jeffrey Epstein had been arrested in 2019.

events.title: Maxwell's Scheduled Trial
events.description: The writer references Ghislaine Maxwell's scheduled trial in November 2021 and seeks to discuss it with the victim/witness coordinator.

events.title: Writer's Involvement with Epstein and Maxwell
events.description: The writer describes being 'involved' with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein for a few years in the mid-1990s, during which unspeakable things happened that altered their life.

keyFacts: An unnamed individual describes being a victim of Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein in the mid-1990s, stating the events were 'unspeakable' and 'altered the course of my entire life.'
The writer felt invalidated in seeking justice, citing that they were not a minor at the time and that the statute of limitations had expired for their experience.
The correspondence was sent to a victim/witness coordinator at the SDNY in October 2021, seeking resources and information about Maxwell's upcoming November 2021 trial.
The writer states they had been trying to keep their experience a secret for about 25 years until Epstein's 2019 arrest brought the case to public attention.
